oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tate Spring Hotel
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Tate Spring Hotel, Thos. Tomlinson, Owner sand Prop'r. Shipping Tate Spring Water Daily at the rate of 4,000 Barrels and Cases per year. Depot one mile of Spring, on M. & C. G. R.R. Hotel open year round. Rates moderate. Write for pamphlets, giving full information. Address; F.B. & Thos. Tomlinson, Tate Spring, Tenn. Etching of building on card.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hotels; Springs; Resorts; Advertisements;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
